div.div: at Gettysburg, Pa. | Shirk at Musselman

tr.td: GC wins toss. Elects to recieve. Johns Hopkins defends south goal
Jamie Sullivan kickoff 61 yards to the GC4, Matt McFadden return 21 yards to the GC25 (Quinn Donaldson).
Kevin McCarthy rush for loss of 1 yard to the GC24 (Jack Campbell).
Kyle Wigley rush for 16 yards to the GC40, 1ST DOWN GC (Jack Toner).
Ryan Thompson rush for loss of 8 yards to the GC32, fumble by Ryan Thompson recovered by GC Sam McDermott at GC27.
PENALTY GC illegal participation 5 yards to the GC22.
Kyle Wigley rush for 6 yards to the GC28 (Lance Hammond).
Sam McDermott pass complete to Kyle Wigley for 5 yards to the GC33 (Charlie Kassis;Brady Watts), PENALTY GC holding declined.
